::Zardus::

Zardus nods and also stands up. "Allright, I'll let you know when a 
decision has been made."

He almost reaches out to shake Ominous' hand, but remembers that 
doing so would drain quite alot of his own energy. "My forces look 
like they're doing fine at the Cybertronian Fire, so we don't need 
assistance yet. I'll let you know if we do though."

Zardus wasn't eager to put himself in Ominous's debt, but he wasn't 
too egocentered to ask for help when neccessary either. "Do you use 
the regular comm frequecies?" He asks, making sure he'd be able to 
contact Ominous.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Ominous looks across at Zardus. He knew that this wouldnt be 
> easy...and keeping Hell Beast alive was going to be a priority he 
didnt want 
> to get into. And Megatron as well. Without those two, the 
Energonians would 
> have never been created.
>        "I am aware we will have to keep some important bots alive 
to ensure 
> my Species survival. But thats not important right now, all I need 
to know is 
> that I have your support." He went on, "And I will give you some 
time to 
> think it over. But, in the meantime, if there is any military 
support I can 
> help you with, or anything I can do, let me know."
>        With that he stood up, ready for departure with Akron.
